channel.title: No-ip help
channel.description: please explain i have a no-ip account i made different servers if i try to log in it says its not up so u type in 0.0.0.0 which your server tells u to then you tell ur friend to type your no ip host mine is inurfacescape.no-ip.biz i know how to host it with one of my ips but i hate giving out my ip address and i dont know how i got the ip address because my router ip adress startes with 71. and the 1 they can log on with startes with 192. but that only works with my brother cuz he lives with me and shares the same enternet please help!
